summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Hanford Street, from 64th Avenue Southwest to a point approximately 50 feet east of Benton Place; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 13884 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
